name: Ancient Hacker
description:
Ancient Hacker game play

Explore the Library 

Play as an ancient spirit, Logia, who searches through an old library looking for a special tome. Guards and ghosts protect the library from unauthorized intruders. You must rely on stealth and resilience to get through the heavily guarded library. 

Gain Skills

You will learn to control the Grimoire-Drones, special books that help you interact with the physical world and collect spell components.
